name: cities_get_information_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airvisual.
Tool description: Query for Air Pollution Data, Weather information, Health Recommendations, etc... as on the official application
API description: Fetches information about a specific city based on its ID.

is_id.description: The value of id field (type is city) that received from .../auto-complete API

aqiindex.description: The AQI index to use (default is 'us'). Options are 'us' or 'cn'.

lang.description: The language for the response (default is 'en_US').
